4. District 3 Councilor Jeff Browning

District 3 Councilor Jeff Browning
==================================

TERM AND RESPONSIBILITIES
-------------------------

Appointed July 2018, serving until November 2018  
Elected November 2018, serving until November 2020  
Re-elected November 2020, serving until November 2023 

Re-elected November 2023, serving until November 2026

COUNCIL LIAISON TO
------------------

* 4A - Wichita Falls Economic Development Corporation
* 4B - Sales Tax Corporation
* Construction Board of Adjustment / Appeals
* Water Resources Commission
* Outside Agencies
* Finance Committee

CITY COUNCIL GOALS
------------------

* Improvements in Small Business growth in Wichita Falls
* Sustainability of the Existing Business
* City Water Resource Development in the future
* Industry Growth
* Relationships with City Departments on welcoming in new Businesses and Industry

PROFESSIONAL

* Master Electrician
* Owner of Browning Electric

EDUCATION
---------

* Rider High School
* Midwestern State University
* Vernon College – Master Electrician

PERSONAL
--------

* Born and raised in Wichita Falls
* Married to wife Amy since 2000
* Two daughters
